game.name: Dragon Fighter
game.description:
A horde of bad souls have attacked your most loving land. Join Dragon Fighter and get ready to defeat the huge army of monsters who will keep attacking you until they die! The only way to overcome this chaos is to beat all of your enemies that come on your way. Do not underestimate your power as you have also entered the game as a legendary warrior in this highly addictive and challenging action-packed Dragon world. You have the weapons and are skilled enough to face off such challenges on your own. 

In this amazing world, you are surrounded by a large number of pet dragons and have grown up as a strong fighter. Grab your weapons and dream team of dragons and be prepared to enter the battlefield where there is no shortage for the dangerous enemies! Each dragon is blessed with unique skills and abilities, so it is completely your choice which one you want to choose to complete your mission in each stage. Do not forget to grab coins, while fighting your way to the ultimate level in this one of the best fighting games for kids. 

Fight like a pro and do your best to bring the statue of the legendary warrior to life! Go through the details and learn quickly how to help your warrior to transform into a strong dragon! Use your ability to slash enemies with swords and shoot projectiles as needed! It is up to you on how bravely you face off your enemies and avenge the people of Baljing and protect the entire land. Move your character using the arrow keys on desktop, A button by pressing Z key and B button by pressing X key! Enjoy more free battle shooter games on atmegame.com without download!
